message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product. Given its exceptional value, I'm confident that you'll find our asking price of $1500000 quite reasonable.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, I was thinking of a price point closer to $700000.

Bob, after considering your previous offer, we're willing to come down a bit further. We would like to offer you a new price of $1300000. We believe that this price accurately represents the high quality and immense value that our product delivers. We hope that you see the value as well.
I appreciate the flexibility, Alice. To move this forward, I'm willing to raise my offer to $850000.

Bob, considering your previous offers, we're willing to make another concession to reach an agreement. We would be open to sell the product at $1225000. This price takes into account your budget while still reflecting the high value of our product. We hope that you can see the benefits of agreeing to this price.
Alice, I understand where you're coming from, but I need to stick to my budget. I'm willing to raise my offer to $950000.
